body_html:
While writing the tests I found that our current code does not support explicit batch_size because the batch_size is inferred dynamically. Thus the input loses shape during training.

Please see commit if you agree with fix-up @ebrevdo .
body_text:
While writing the tests I found that our current code does not support explicit batch_size because the batch_size is inferred dynamically. Thus the input loses shape during training.
Please see commit if you agree with fix-up @ebrevdo .
body:
While writing the tests I found that our current code does not support explicit `batch_size` because the `batch_size` is inferred [dynamically](https://github.com/alrojo/tensorflow/blob/dynamic_decoder/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/seq2seq.py#L89). Thus the input loses shape during training.

Please see [commit](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/4686/commits/be166a7df2023fe5600731dbf199839953694a46) if you agree with fix-up @ebrevdo .
